reasoning: Gross margins expected to stabilize around 44% as the improving trend from 42.3% to 45.2% moderates with mix effects from new products. Net margins forecast at 25% based on 8-quarter average of 25.1%, supported by operational leverage and services growth. EBIT margins at 29% reflect continued operational efficiency. CapEx remains low at 3% of revenue, consistent with asset-light model averaging 2.7% historically. Negative retention ratio of -5% reflects AAPL's capital return strategy where total dividends and buybacks (~$25B quarterly) exceed net income, funded by strong cash generation and balance sheet optimization.
